overview: Pierre Desjardin is a well-known politician of the French Riviera, who also make profit from very illicit parallel businesses. Married with Sandrine for four years, his conjugal sex life fell apart a long time ago, due to his lassitude and his absences. Therefore, when Pierre travels, hard for him to resist the charms of the women he mets, always captivated by his position. It could have last for decades if his wife didn't caught him with their housemaid... Neglected for many years, Sandrine finally have the keys to make him fall.
title: Reversible
